Coolguy_basic.CmpStr_Content_ToInt: Get the number from the compared string
Coolguy_basic.CmpStr_Content_ToString: Get the string from the compared
Coolguy_basic.CmpStr_SetString|param|str: the string as comparsion, eg: hello
Coolguy_basic.CmpStr_StringEqual: Is the compared string same as expected?
Coolguy_basic.RunWalkLine: Search the line in a specific number of intersections
Coolguy_basic.RunWalkLine_Timer: Search line in a specific time
Coolguy_basic.RunWalkLine|param|EndTime: the time after crossing the intersections, eg: 0.25
Coolguy_basic.SetCmpValue: Set the value as comparsion for five GraySensors
Coolguy_basic.SetCmpValue|param|CmpNum0: the comparsion fo channel0 GraySensors, eg: 500
Coolguy_basic.SetCmpValue|param|CmpNum1: the comparsion fo channel1 GraySensors, eg: 500
Coolguy_basic.SetCmpValue|param|CmpNum2: the comparsion fo channel2 GraySensors, eg: 500
Coolguy_basic.SetCmpValue|param|CmpNum3: the comparsion fo channel3 GraySensors, eg: 500
Coolguy_basic.SetCmpValue|param|CmpNum4: the comparsion fo channel4 GraySensors, eg: 500
Coolguy_basic.coolguy_WS2812_Init|param|: the ports component connect, eg: servo_ports.J2
Coolguy_basic.coolguy_WS2812_SetRGB|para: the brightness when RGB on, eg: 120
Coolguy_basic.exter_button|param|exterpi: the ports component connect, eg: exter_ports.J1
Coolguy_basic.exter_motor_back:
Car go back

left: IO5/11
right: IO8/12
Coolguy_basic.exter_motor_drive|param|di: the turn of motor, eg: motor_dir.FWD
Coolguy_basic.exter_motor_drive|param|ex: the ports component connect, eg: motor_ports.J7
Coolguy_basic.exter_motor_drive|param|sp: the speed of motor and range from 0 to 1023, eg: 500
Coolguy_basic.exter_motor_go:
Car go straight

left: IO5/11
right: IO8/12

Car turn left(wheels reverse)

left: IO5/11
right: IO8/12
Coolguy_basic.exter_motor_right:
Car turn right(wheels reverse)

left: IO5/11
right: IO8/12

Car stop
left: IO5/11
right: IO8/12
Coolguy_basic.servo_control|param|val: the expected rotation of servo, eg: 90
